attributes.action: Stop flights from countries with high COVID-19 infection rates.
attributes.additional_details: The pandemic may have multiple peaks and may go into vicious loops, if the virus can still be imported into the UK from other infected hotspots.
attributes.background: COVID 19 is highly contagious virus that caused the 2020 pandemic. In China, after the infection rates slowed down, it started to increase again mostly from other countries. We want to limit the spread of the virus to control the pandemic inside the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
